swisspass-id.de: Tell me your SwissPass Card number

swisspass-id-explanation.de:
Your SwissCard number is shown on the front of your SwissCard, as shown below.
It must be in the following format: XXX-XXX-XXX-X

account-reactivated.de: We reactivated your account and send you an email for reset your password at {{email}}.

searching-receipts.de: Searching for receipts on date {{date}} for SwissPass #{{card}}

Which medium?.de: Auf welchem Gerät möchten Sie das sehen?
